title: Deviant Nightmares
description: 18 new voices of modern horror bring you their previously unpublished tales of madness chaos and nightmare-inducing terrors that will keep you on the edge of your seat well past your bed-time, afraid to turn off the light. We searched the world's largest online art community, Deviant Art, for the best new talent we could find. Prepare for a journey into the dark unknown and beyond from the minds of tomorrow's masters of horror fiction. But don't blame us if it gives you nightmares. You've been warned.
author: Joseph Sweet
